attributes.action: Reduce traffic congestion and pollution by conducting a nationwide survey on how people get to work and school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The data collected would help to reduce congestion and pollution. Councils and bus companies can you use the data to plan new routes. At present it is left to the county councils to collect data. They don't do it very well or not at all. When did your county council ask you for data?
